nodes.bodyText:
Please remove that file, it wont be used.
If release scripts need to edit the version number after a release, /build.gradle is your friend. Theres also a version.base and that's the source of information.
https://github.com/apache/lucene-solr/blob/master/build.gradle#L38
There is a reason why this file was removed, so dont restore it!
